DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Discord bot token(ボットのトークン)

CHANNEL1_ID.description: ID of the first channel(int)(1つ目のチャンネルのID(整数))

CHANNEL1_URL.description: Webhook URL for the first channel(1つ目のチャンネルのWebhookURL)

CHANNEL1_LANG.description: Languages used in the first channel(1つ目のチャンネルで使う言語)

CHANNEL2_ID.description: ID of the second channel(int)(2つ目のチャンネルのID(整数))

CHANNEL2_URL.description: Webhook URL for the second channel(2つ目のチャンネルのWebhookURL)

CHANNEL2_LANG.description: Language used in second channel(2つ目のチャンネルで使う言語)

GAS_URL.description: When using Google Apps Script translation, use the URL(GASでデプロイした翻訳を使うときはURLを入力)

IGNORE_ID.description: If there is a user you want to ignore, enter the ID(int) separated by a colon(無視ユーザーのID(数字)を':'区切りで入力
